GVRCollisionMatrix - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
The Collision Matrix defines the collision between groups of GVRRigidBody.
GVRCollisionMatrix() - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.physics.GVRCollisionMatrix
Creates a new Collision Matrix.
GVRConeTwistConstraint - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
Represents a constraint for two bodies in which the first one (the owner) swings constrained to a right circular conic trajectory around a vortex while the other body is simply fixed to this vortex (meaning that the vortex will move if the second body moves).
GVRConeTwistConstraint(GVRContext, GVRRigidBody, float[], float[], float[]) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.physics.GVRConeTwistConstraint
Construct a new instance of a conic twist constraint.
GVRFixedConstraint - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
Represents a constraint that forces two rigid bodies to keep same distance and same rotation in respect to each other.
GVRFixedConstraint(GVRContext, GVRRigidBody) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.physics.GVRFixedConstraint
Constructs new instance of fixed constraint.
GVRGenericConstraint - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
Represents a generic constraint for two rigid bodies that are linked by a joint point related to the first one (the owner of the constraint).
GVRGenericConstraint(GVRContext, GVRRigidBody, float[], float[], float[]) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.physics.GVRGenericConstraint
Construct a new instance of a generic constraint.
GVRHingeConstraint - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
Represents a hinge constraint that restricts two rigid bodies to only rotate around one axis.
GVRHingeConstraint(GVRContext, GVRRigidBody, float[], float[], float[], float[]) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.physics.GVRHingeConstraint
Constructs a new instance of hinge constraint.
GVRPhysicsContext - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
This class represents the Physics context with its own main loop.
GVRPoint2PointConstraint - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
Represents a constraint that restricts translation of two rigid bodies to keep fixed distance from a local pivot.
GVRPoint2PointConstraint(GVRContext, GVRRigidBody, float[], float[]) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.physics.GVRPoint2PointConstraint
Constructs new instance of point-to-point constraint.
GVRRigidBody - Class in org.gearvrf.physics

GVRSliderConstraint - Class in org.gearvrf.physics
Represents a constraint that allows two rigid bodies to rotate and translate over a single axis.

Represents a physics world where all GVRSceneObject with GVRRigidBody component attached to are simulated.
